verses.verse: Set the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thy mouth. <S%H2441><s%> He shall come as an eagle <S%H5404><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> they have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and trespassed <S%H6586><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> my law. <S%H8451><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall cry <S%H2199><s%> unto me, My God, <S%H430><s%> we know <S%H3045><s%> thee.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath cast off <S%H2186><s%> the thing that is good: <S%H2896><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> him.

They <S%H1992><s%> have set up kings, <S%H4427><s%> but not <S%H3808><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> me: they have made princes, <S%H8323><s%> and I knew <S%H3045><s%> it not: <S%H3808><s%> of their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> have they made <S%H6213><s%> them idols, <S%H6091><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> they may be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

Thy calf, <S%H5695><s%> O Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> hath cast thee off; <S%H2186><s%> mine anger <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them: how long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> will it be ere <S%H3808><s%> they attain <S%H3201><s%> to innocency? <S%H5356><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from Israel <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3478><s%> was it <S%H1931><s%> also: the workman <S%H2796><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> it; <S%H1931><s%> therefore it is not <S%H3808><s%> God: <S%H430><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> broken in pieces. <S%H7616><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they have sown <S%H2232><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and they shall reap <S%H7114><s%> the whirlwind: <S%H5492><s%> it hath no <S%H369><s%> stalk: <S%H7054><s%> the bud <S%H6780><s%> shall yield <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H1097><s%> meal: <S%H7058><s%> if so be <S%H194><s%> it yield, <S%H6213><s%> the strangers <S%H2114><s%> shall swallow it up. <S%H1104><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> is swallowed up: <S%H1104><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> shall they be <S%H1961><s%> among the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> as a vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein is no <S%H369><s%> pleasure. <S%H2656><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> a wild ass <S%H6501><s%> alone <S%H909><s%> by himself: Ephraim <S%H669><s%> hath hired <S%H8566><s%> lovers. <S%H158><s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they have hired <S%H8566><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> them, and they shall sorrow <S%H2490><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> for the burden <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4853><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of princes. <S%H8269><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> hath made many <S%H7235><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> to sin, <S%H2398><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto him to sin. <S%H2398><s%>
I have written <S%H3789><s%> to him the great things <S%H7230><s%> of my law, <S%H8451><s%> but they were counted <S%H2803><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> a strange thing. <S%H2114><s%>

They sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> for the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of mine offerings, <S%H1890><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it; but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> accepteth <S%H7521><s%> them not; <S%H3808><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> will he remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and visit <S%H6485><s%> their sins: <S%H2403><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> his Maker, <S%H6213><s%> and buildeth <S%H1129><s%> temples; <S%H1964><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> fenced <S%H1219><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%> but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> upon his cities, <S%H5892><s%> and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> thereof.
